description: SRD Data: Build the 5e item database from Open5e API

userStories.title: Weapons database
userStories.description: Fetch and structure all SRD weapons
acceptanceCriteria: Create backend/app/data/ directory
Create backend/app/data/weapons.json
Include all simple weapons (club, dagger, greatclub, handaxe, javelin, light hammer, mace, quarterstaff, sickle, spear)
Include all martial weapons (battleaxe, flail, glaive, greataxe, greatsword, halberd, lance, longsword, maul, morningstar, pike, rapier, scimitar, shortsword, trident, war pick, warhammer, whip)
Include ranged weapons (crossbows, longbow, shortbow)
Each weapon has: id, name, type, category, damage_dice, damage_type, weight, value_gp, weapon_properties
JSON is valid and well-formatted

userStories.title: Armor database
userStories.description: Fetch and structure all SRD armor
acceptanceCriteria: Create backend/app/data/armor.json
Include light armor (padded, leather, studded leather)
Include medium armor (hide, chain shirt, scale mail, breastplate, half plate)
Include heavy armor (ring mail, chain mail, splint, plate)
Include shields
Each armor has: id, name, type, category, armor_type, ac_base, ac_bonus, stealth_disadvantage, strength_requirement, weight, value_gp
JSON is valid and well-formatted

userStories.title: Potions database
acceptanceCriteria: Create backend/app/data/potions.json
Include all healing potions (healing, greater, superior, supreme)
Include common potions (climbing, fire breath, flying, giant strength variants, growth, heroism, invisibility, mind reading, poison, resistance, speed, water breathing)
Each potion has: id, name, type, rarity, effect_description, healing_dice (if applicable), duration, value_gp
JSON is valid and well-formatted

userStories.title: Adventuring gear database
acceptanceCriteria: Create backend/app/data/gear.json
Include essentials: backpack, bedroll, rope, torch, rations, waterskin, tinderbox
Include tools: thieves' tools, healer's kit, climber's kit
Include containers: pouch, chest, barrel, sack
Each item has: id, name, type, category, description, weight, value_gp
JSON is valid and well-formatted

userStories.title: Combined SRD index
userStories.description: Create a combined searchable index of all items
acceptanceCriteria: Create backend/app/data/srd_index.json
Combine all items from weapons, armor, potions, gear
Each entry has: id, name, type, category, rarity (if applicable)
Sorted alphabetically by name
Include total count at top level
JSON is valid and well-formatted
userStories.notes: This index is used for quick search/autocomplete
